name: Garden (Dominik Lussier-Marcotte)
description:
Three powerful artifacts await those who can solve the garden's puzzles.  

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left click - Action
  • Right click - Cancel
  • Scroll wheel - Cycle ability

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Level Design, Digital Art, Modeling, VFX
Viktor Briceno - Game Design, Level Design, Programming
Luis Boscan - Game Design, Level Design, Programming

Garden is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College course.
